Package snakes

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • snakes.Square
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    snakes.ISquare

    public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
implements snakes.ISquare
    Square is responsible for holding a Player on it. It knows at what position it stands on the Board and what Player that stands on it. Furthermore, it can distinguish whether it is occupied or not. The Square always knows its neighboring squares and whether it is the first or the last one on the board or not and whether it is a WormholeExit or not. It can enter and exit Players on it. Because it knows whether there is already a Player on it, Square provides the Information about where to go else. The class is being used by the game and the player. The class should be used when a player moves on the board.

        public void enter​(snakes.Player player)
        Description copied from interface: snakes.ISquare
